resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-UL-id</catalog>
    <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/111748</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/111748</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/111748</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Enačbe</string>
            <string language="en">Equations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gleichungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Équations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Equações</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Equazioni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξισώσεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ecuaciones</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Sliko je potrebno natisniti na (barvni) papir in razrezati ob črtah. Naloga učenca, dijaka ali skupine je, da ponovno sestavi šestkotnik tako, da reši enačbe.</string>
            <string language="en">Picture needs to be printed and cut along the lines. The game goal is to solve the given equations and put pieces back into original shape.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">enačba</string>
            <string language="en">equation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">matematika</string>
            <string language="en">mathematics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">igra</string>
            <string language="en">game</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abbildung muß gedruckt werden und Schnitt 
entlang den Zeilen. Das Spielziel ist, die gegebenen Gleichungen
zu lösen und Stücke zurück in ursprüngliche Form zu setzen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'image doit être imprimée et coupe le long des
lignes. Le but de jeu est de résoudre les équations données 
et de mettre des morceaux de nouveau dans la forme initiale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O retrato necessita ser imprimido e corte ao 
longo das linhas. O objetivo do jogo é resolver as equações 
dadas e pôr para trás partes na forma original.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'immagine deve essere stampata e taglio seguendo
le righe. L'obiettivo del gioco è di risolvere le date 
equazioni e di mettere le parti nuovamente dentro figura originale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η εικόνα πρέπει να τυπωθεί και αποκοπή σύμφωνα με τις
γραμμές. Ο στόχος παιχνιδιών είναι να λυθούν οι δεδομένες 
εξισώσεις και να τεθούν τα κομμάτια πίσω στην αρχική μορφή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El cuadro necesita ser impreso y corte a lo largo
de las líneas. La meta del juego es solucionar las ecuaciones 
dadas y poner pedazos nuevamente dentro de dimensión de una variable 
original.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gleichung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">équation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mathématiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">jeu</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">equação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">matemática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">jogo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">equazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">matematica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">gioco</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εξίσωση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαθηματικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παιχνίδι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ecuación</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">matemáticas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">juego</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
